name: Escape To Daylight 2.0
description:
Created for the Horror Themed Game Jam #11

Based in a near dystopian future our protagonist having finished work must make his way home to his family while dodging the states security. 

The main objective is to find the rebel leader and acquire enough points to take the bus home while adding to individual artistic expressions around to try to brighten a grey and bleak world.

----------------------------------------------

Check out the controls as there is some blue one one way platforms you must jump into while holding up(w) or down (s).

The red wall can be dashed through with the F key.

Get used to the wall jump as I've not play tested to much.

----------------------------------------------

Please comment on the Jams page as feedback would be greatly appreciated.
